isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL® VT 365 DIESEL ENGINE - CRANKCASE, CRANKSHAFT and BEARINGS, CAMSHAFT and BUSHINGS - Cleaning, Inspection, and Reconditioning - Measuring Camshaft Bushings

svcproc.title: Measuring Camshaft Bushings
svcproc.para: Inspect the five camshaft bushings for wear and proper running clearance as follows:

step1.para: Use a Telescoping Gauge and 2-3 inch micrometer to measure camshaft bushing inside diameters with bushings installed in crankcase. Record readings.

figure.caption: Figure 315. Measurement for inner diameter of camshaft bushing

step1.para: To determine running clearance, subtract previous camshaft journal diameter readings from camshaft bushing inside diameter readings.
If maximum allowable running clearance is exceeded , replace camshaft bushings. See camshaft bushing removal and installation procedures.
Inspect each bushing bore in crankcase for burrs or debris that could damage new bushings. Remove burrs and clean bores thoroughly before installing new camshaft bushings.
